mpm.spiders package¶

Submodules¶

mpm.spiders.modinfo module¶

class mpm.spiders.modinfo.RepositorySpider(name=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: scrapy.spider.Spider

Base Spider class

Spider used to retrieve mod informations from a domain that provides and aggregation of mod description pages. An example could be curseforge. This spider does not actually download the mod data but just fills the ModItem

parse(response)¶

Extract mod informations from a response, if any
